bibl.title: The Nabateans in the Early Hellenistic Period: The Testimony of Posidippus of Pella.
bibl.note: Communication présentée au colloque "Les Arabes dans l'Antiquité" (Lyon, 6-7 janvier 2005). - The Rediscovery of Posidippus. - Posidippus' Litihika. - Posidippus and Arabia. - AB 7 (I 30-35). - AB 16 (III 8-13). - Posidippus and the Nabataeans. - AB 76 (XII 12-15).
bibl.seg: GRAF D.F., The Nabateans in the Early Hellenistic Period: The Testimony of Posidippus of Pella.
